items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Darker color
items.body: Cute and very stretchy! A little darker color than the picture Read more
items.author: Bayleigh Goss

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but too tight at hips
items.body: It’s a pretty pattern and seemed like it would be comfortable to wear. It didn’t fit me well though. There is a horizontal seam that is right at my hips widest part and it was tight making it look very unattractive. I admittedly have a big booty but if the seam were just a bit higher, the dress would have flowed over that and fit very well. If you are slim, you won’t worry about that. Read more
items.author: Crystalyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, well made, comfortable and has pockets!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I ordered this for a 50th wedding anniversary photo shoot with all our children, grandchildren and great-grandchildren as a backup to vintage lace dress being altered, just in case. I like it so much that I may change my mind and wear this instead of the one being altered. But if not, I will wear to our anniversary breakfast being hosted by friends that same weekend. I really like it! The attached video is right out of the box, tag still on, not ironed or styled. Just threw it on a voila! Read more
items.author: Betty Lowery

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great photo dress!
items.body: Great fit and quality! We used them for newborn pictures and it turned out perfect! I’m 6’0 tall and wore the XXL - and it was a perfect comfortable fit. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Gill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: This is a really lovely dress. It has a lining so it isn’t too sheer. I don’t wear many dresses so finding one that I like can be a challenge. For reference, I am wearing a size Large, height @ 5’7”, 175 lbs. Read more
items.author: "anonymously Anonymous"

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute but a tad see through
items.body: Wore this to my bridal shower, but sadly it was a tad see through in the bust area. Wore nude underwear and bra and it was fine. Super soft, not scratchy material and it’s very stretchy so you could size down one, I wish I went down one. Read more
items.author: Skylar Horton

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Gorgeous Dress, questionable packaging.
items.body: Though dress is absolutely gorgeous, it seems that this dress was a "did not fit the hips return" as one pocket was torn and in a ripped open "clear green striped ready to ship baggy" (not even in the original Kirundo zip bag) - seller then shoved this dress in a "too small orange stripe Amazon bubble shipping bag" which was delivered to my wife busted open, dress exposed and barely inside it's "green stripe ready to ship bag" -- I hope my Monday delivery of same dress, different size Emerald Green dress is received in much better care taken manner. Plan to purchase other colors too. Read more
items.author: Rob & Rene Dovey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sage dress size xl
items.body: Well made. Generous stretch...i could have sized down one size. Normally wear a size 16 and the xl was spot on with a little wiggle room in the stretch. Read more
items.author: Cherie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Pink, White, Burgundy, Cream, Sage Green, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
